entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Shaunavon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:06 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5 except minus 1 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 5 except minus 1 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:03 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 12:03 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
